claim: Hypothyroidism can cause poor ability to tolerate heat.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It can cause a number of symptoms , such as poor ability to tolerate cold , a feeling of tiredness , constipation , depression , and weight gain .

claim: Hypothyroidism can cause poor ability to tolerate heat.
premise_source_doc_sentence: An estimated one-third of the world 's population currently lives in areas of low dietary iodine levels , making iodine-deficiency the most common cause of hypothyroidism and endemic goiter .

claim: Hypothyroidism can cause poor ability to tolerate heat.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Worldwide , too little iodine in the diet is the most common cause of hypothyroidism .

claim: Hypothyroidism can cause poor ability to tolerate heat.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In countries with enough iodine in the diet , the most common cause of hypothyroidism is the autoimmune condition Hashimoto 's thyroiditis .

claim: Hypothyroidism can cause poor ability to tolerate heat.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Common hyperthyroid symptoms include irritability , weight loss , fast heartbeat , heat intolerance , diarrhea , and enlargement of the thyroid .
